flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
太陽エネルギーから　栄養を　つくりだす。
気温の　高い　日中　活発に　動き
太陽が　沈むと　ぱったり　動かなくなる。

Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around
actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as
soon as the sun goes down for the night.

Sunflora converte l’energia solare in nutrimento. È attivo
durante il giorno quando fa caldo. Tuttavia, appena il sole
tramonta non fa più il minimo movimento.

Sunflora transforma la energía solar en nutrientes. De día,
cuando hace calor, está en continuo movimiento. Solo para
cuando comienza a anochecer.

Sonnflora verwandelt Solarenergie in Nährstoffe. Tagsüber,
wenn es warm ist, ist es sehr aktiv. Wenn aber die Sonne
untergegangen ist, hört es auf, sich zu bewegen.

Héliatronc convertit l’énergie solaire en nutriments. Il remue
activement pendant la journée, quand il fait chaud. Il redevient
immobile dès que le soleil se couche.

태양 에너지에서 영양을 만들어낸다.
기온이 높은 낮에는 활발하게 움직이고
태양이 지면 뚝 하니 움직이지 않게 된다.

たいようエネルギーから　えいようを　つくりだす。
きおんの　たかい　にっちゅう　かっぱつに　うごき
たいようが　しずむと　ぱったり　うごかなくなる。

太陽エネルギーから　栄養を　つくりだす。
気温の　高い　日中　活発に　動き
太陽が　沈むと　ぱったり　動かなくなる。

Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around
actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as
soon as the sun goes down for the night.

Sunflora converte l’energia solare in nutrimento. È attivo
durante il giorno quando fa caldo. Tuttavia, appena il sole
tramonta non fa più il minimo movimento.

Sunflora transforma la energía solar en nutrientes. De día,
cuando hace calor, está en continuo movimiento. Solo para
cuando comienza a anochecer.

Sonnflora verwandelt Solarenergie in Nährstoffe. Tagsüber,
wenn es warm ist, ist es sehr aktiv. Wenn aber die Sonne
untergegangen ist, hört es auf, sich zu bewegen.

Héliatronc convertit l’énergie solaire en nutriments. Il remue
activement pendant la journée, quand il fait chaud. Il redevient
immobile dès que le soleil se couche.

태양 에너지에서 영양을 만들어낸다.
기온이 높은 낮에는 활발하게 움직이고
태양이 지면 뚝 하니 움직이지 않게 된다.

たいようエネルギーから　えいようを　つくりだす。
きおんの　たかい　にっちゅう　かっぱつに　うごき
たいようが　しずむと　ぱったり　うごかなくなる。

暖かい　日差しが　エネルギー。
太陽を　追いかけて　移動する
習性で　知られている。

It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for
its habit of moving in pursuit of it.

Trae energia dalla luce del sole e si muove di continuo
per cercare di assorbirne sempre di più.

Obtiene energía de la luz solar. Este Pokémon es
famoso por su heliotropismo.

Warmes Sonnenlicht gibt ihm Energie. Daher wandert
es stets dem Sonnenlicht hinterher.

Les rayons du soleil lui donnent de l’énergie. Il est
connu pour migrer vers les régions ensoleillées.

따뜻한 햇살이 에너지다.
태양을 쫓아 이동하는
습성으로 알려져 있다.

あたたかい　ひざしが　エネルギー。
たいようを　おいかけて　いどうする
しゅうせいで　しられている。

暑い　季節が　近づくと
顔の　花びらは　鮮やかになり
活発に　動くようになる。

As the hot season approaches, the petals on this
Pokémon’s face become more vivid and lively.

Con l’avvicinarsi della bella stagione, i suoi petali si
fanno più vivi e splendenti.

A medida que se acerca el verano, va adquiriendo un
color más vivo e intenso en los pétalos de la cara.

Steht der Sommer bevor, werden die Blätter um
das Gesicht dieses Pokémon aktiv und lebhaft.

À l’approche des beaux jours, les pétales entourant
sa tête deviennent plus chatoyants.

더운 계절이 다가오면
얼굴의 꽃잎이 선명해지고
활발하게 움직이게 된다.

あつい　きせつが　ちかづくと
かおの　はなびらは　あざやかになり
かっぱつに　うごくようになる。

Since it converts sunlight
into energy, it is always looking
in the direction of the sun.

Since it converts sunlight
into energy, it is always looking
in the direction of the sun.

It gets energy from warm sunlight
and is known for its habit of
moving in pursuit of it.

Les rayons du soleil lui donnent de
l’énergie. Il est connu pour migrer
vers les régions ensoleillées.

It gets energy from warm sunlight
and is known for its habit of
moving in pursuit of it.

Les rayons du soleil lui donnent de
l’énergie. Il est connu pour migrer
vers les régions ensoleillées.

In the daytime, it rushes about in a
hectic manner, but it comes to a
complete stop when the sun sets.

It converts sunlight into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals and becomes still.

It gets energy from warm sunlight
and is known for its habit of
moving in pursuit of it.

and is known for its habit of
moving in pursuit of it.

It gets energy from warm sunlight
and is known for its habit of
moving in pursuit of it.

It converts sunlight into energy. In the
darkness after sunset, it closes its petals
and becomes still.

In the daytime, it rushes about in a
hectic manner, but it comes to a complete
stop when the sun sets.

SUNFLORA convert solar energy into
nutrition. They are highly active in the
warm daytime but suddenly stop moving as
soon as the sun sets.

SUNFLORA converts solar energy into
nutrition. It moves around actively in
the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes
down for the night.

SUNFLORA converts solar energy into
nutrition. It moves around actively in
the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes
down for the night.

As the hot season
approaches, the
petals on this POKéMON's face
become more vivid
and lively.

In the daytime, it
rushes about in a
hectic manner, but it comes to a com­
plete stop when
the sun sets.

It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.
